entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 13 except minus 20 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 13 except minus 20 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 30 January 2023
